price: О ви који верујете, зашто говорите оно што не радите?!
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لِمَ تَقُولُونَ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lima taqūlūna mā lā tafʿalūna
